aboveFold.properties:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-color), var(--primary-dark));
    background-clip: text;

unused.properties:
background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--gradient-red), var(--gradient-red-dark));
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgb(238 90 82 / 40%);

background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--gradient-yellow), var(--gradient-yellow-dark));
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgb(255 177 66 / 40%);

background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--gradient-green), var(--gradient-green-dark));
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgb(78 205 196 / 40%);
